name: Televisa
description: Televisa, officially known as Grupo Televisa, S.A.B. de C.V., is headquartered in Mexico City, Mexico. The company was founded in 1973 by Emilio Azcárraga Milmo. name: Telekom
description: Telekom is the legal name of the company, headquartered in Bonn, Germany. The company was founded in 1995, emerging from the privatization of Deutsche Bundespost, which was established in 1947. The company has launched various products over the years, including its mobile services in 1996 and broadband services in 2000. Telekom has established key partnerships with technology providers and content creators to enhance its service offerings. Overall, Telekom continues to adapt to the evolving telecommunications landscape through innovation and strategic initiatives.
